title: Lost Stars
description: This follows Thane Kyrell and Ciena Ree, two childhood friends from the outer rim, as they take part in the galactic civil war of Episodes IV-VI. They enlist as together as officers in the Imperial Navy and are thrilled to work on such a magnificent battle station. Until the events of Episode IV causes one of them to defect to the Rebel Alliance. This book follows these characters through all of the main events of Episodes IV, V, and VI, and slightly beyond to the battle of Jakku.
